nodes.text: Legacy 17: Claws of the Dragon, Part 4 is the seventeenth issue of the Star Wars: Legacy comic series.

In the heart of the Sith Temple on Coruscant, an unexpected acolyte trains in the ways of the Sith. Captured by Darth Krayt, Cade Skywalker has made an unholy bargain with the usurper Emperor. Is Cade following in the footsteps of Vader?
A turning-point issue in the most surprising Legacy arc yet!
